mcm.theater.actor
Class StageDump

java.lang.Object
  mcm.graphics.Body
      mcm.theater.Actor
          mcm.theater.actor.StageDump

public class StageDump
extends Actor

StageDump actors periodically write the Stage's contents to an image file.

Author:
Monika Mevenkamp

Constructor Detail

StageDump

public StageDump(java.lang.String name,
                 int dumpDelay,
                 java.lang.String format)
Constructs a new StageDump actor. The actor uses its name as the file name prefix. Its act method periodically writes its stage to image files in the given format. The actor receives a default name if name equals null.

Parameters:
name - the new actor's name and prefix of all files written
dumpDelay - delay in stage clock ticks between writing image files
format - the format to use, actor writes "PNG" files if format equals null

StageDump

public StageDump(java.lang.String name,
                 int dumpDelay)
Constructs a StageDump actor. This constructor has the same effect as StageDump(name, dumpDelay, "PNG").

Method Detail

setFilePrefix

public void setFilePrefix(java.lang.String prefix)
Sets this actor's file name prefix to the given name. The file prefix defaults to the actor's name.

Parameters:
prefix - the file prefix

getFilePrefix

public java.lang.String getFilePrefix()
Returns this actor's file name prefix.

act

public void act()
This actor writes the stage's image to a file every dumpDelay ticks on the stage's clock. The file written is called
<fileName><id>.<format>,
where <fileName> is this actor's file name prefix, which defaults to the actor's name, <id> is the current file number, and <format> is the format given at construction. File numbers start at 0 and continue 1, 2, 3, ...

Overrides:
act in class Actor

getDelay

public int getDelay()
Returns this actor's dumpDelay.

Returns:
Returns the delay.

setDelay

public void setDelay(int delay)
Sets this actor's dumpDelay.

Parameters:
delay - The delay to set.
